title: Aale Saachuputta Kannalaa Lyrics Vil Ambu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer(s) : Anirudh Ravichander
Movie: Â Vil Ambu
Music: Navin
Lyrics : Ekadesi

Aale saachuutta Kannaala
Ayyo thaangalaye ennaala
Moochai vaangi pora munnaala
Paechey ninnuruchu thannaala

Nenjukulla pallanguzhi
Kundhikittu aadura
Noothi yettu kondaangada
BP yathaan yaethura

Na Na Naanana naanaana
Naanaana Naanaana Naanna Naananna
Naana naanna Naa Naa na

Kaanama ponen da goyyale
Ennamo aachuda meiyale
Thala keezha nadukuren kaiyale
Ippa mentala aayiten avalaale

Aale saachuutta Kannaala
Ayyo thaangalaye ennaala
Moochai vaangi pora munnaala
Paechey ninnuruchu thannaala
Kaanama ponen da goyyale
Ennamo aachuda meiyale
Thala keezha nadukuren kaiyale
Ippa mentala aayiten avalaale

Naa lungiya yethi dhan kattuven
Ippa tharayathaan kootavacha
Naa settaiya sevaya seiven
En vaalathaan surutta vacha
Naano thani aalu
Ava serndha sema dhoolu
Onna number 420 ya
Hero vaa aaki putta

Naano Kaanama ponen da goyyale
Ennamo aachuda meiyale
Thala keezha nadukuren kaiyale
Ippa mentala aayiten avalaale

Un nagatha nee kadichidhan thupure
Ada tharaiyellam pookudhu de
Enna ishtama paarthu dhan sirikure
Ulla jivvunu yerudha de
Podi sandalee
unnale thavichen de
Onna number 420 ya

Naano Kaanama ponen da goyyale
Ennamo aachuda meiyale
Thala keezha nadukuren kaiyale
Ippa mentala aayiten avalaale
